modShortDescription: Does the vanilla 4x4 not satisfy your off-roading needs? well this is the vehicle for you. This mod adds a fun offroading buggy that can overcome obstacles in its path.
modDescription:
Does the vanilla 4×4 not satisfy your off-roading needs? well this is the [vehicle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) for you. This mod adds a fun offroading buggy that can overcome obstacles in its path. It also has a custom horn.

The offroading buggy can be unlocked with grease monkey perk 4, or by finding the schematics to craft it.

**Note:** This mod needs to be installed on both client and server for multiplayer.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Zilox135/A20Modlets/tree/main/Offroad%20Buggy%20V1.0)**

If you appreciate Zilox’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/zilox135).

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://github.com/Zilox135/A20Modlets/issues).

**Credits:** [Zilox](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/zilox/)
